definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. as adj. in [[סוּסִים מוּזׇנִים מַשְׁכִּים הָיוּ]] Je 5:8 usu., horses... roaming at large they have become (cf. Eth. sakuya:);—but mng. lustful needed; Aq Theod e)/lkontev, Jer trahentes (sc. genitalia), i.e. [[משְׁכִים]]; read with Arnheim Du Dr [[מַאֲשָׁכִים]], i.e. fed stallions (lit. growing [[אֲשָׁכִים]], Le 21:20; cf. [[מַקְרִין]], [[מַפְרִים]]).
